form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: OPTIONAL FORM 22/10/23, APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION

full_text: Screened by NARA, 2/10/2023 OPTIONAL FORM 230 (English/VICT namese) (Rev. 6.82) DEPT. OF STA FROM APPROVED 50230-104 O.M.B. No. 1405-0015 APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION DON XIN CHIEU-KHAN NHAP-CU VA DANG-KY NGOAI-KIEU INSTRUCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. All questions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room on the form, answer on separate sheets, in dupli cate, using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. DO NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consula officer, The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa is $25.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be grounds for your prosecution and/or deportation. LOI CHI DAN: Mâu don nay phai dien lam HAI BAN bang may chu, hay neu viet tay thi phai viet loi chu in cho ro dqc. Phai trà loi fat ca moi cau hoi, neu co the. Cau não Khong tra loi duoc thi ghi N/A. Neu Khong du chô tren mau don thi tra loi tren giay phu, cung lam hai ban va ghi so thu tu nhu tren mau don. Dinh cac to phy Kem voi mau don. XIN UNG KY TEN tren mau don trude Khi duoc vien chuc lanh-su chi dan. Le phi nhan don xin chieu-Khan nhap-cd nay là 25 My-Kim. Phai trà bang My-Kim hay bang tien dia phuong theo hoi-xuat, hay bang ngan-phieu ngan-hang, Khi duong don ra trinh trudo vien chuc lanh-su. LOI CANH-CAO: Moi ngdoi Khai man hay che dau su that CO the dua toi hau qua bi loai tru vinh-vien vao Hoa-Ky. Du cho co dude nhan vao Hoa-Ky roi, thi su nhap-canh gian-lan cung du de bi truy hay bi truc-xuat, hay ca hai. 1. Family name Ho First name ten Middle name ten 1ót NGO CAU THI 2. Other names used or by which known (If married woman, give maiden name) Nhung ten Khac dudc dung hay duoc nguoi ta goi (Neú là phy-nu co chong thi xin ghi nhú-danh) NGO THI LOAN 3. Full name in native alphabet (If Roman letters not used) Ho va ten viet theo tho-ngú (Neu Khong dung loi chu La-Ma abc) 4. Date of birth 5. Age 6. Place of birth (day) (Month) (year) Tuoi' (City or town) (Province) (Country) Ngay Thang nam (Thanh-pho hay thi-x) (Tinh) (Nuoc, XII) 5 Aug 1902 86 KIEN AN VN 7. Nationality 8. Sex phai 9. Merital status tinh-trang gia-dinh quoc-tich Male Female Single (never married) doc-than I nam nu' Married co v co chong Widowed góa VO góa chong Divorced ly-di Separated Ly-than Vietnamese Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 10. Occupation nghe-nghiep 11. Present address Dia-chi hien-tai NONE 56. TRAN HUU TRANG- P.II- PHU NHUAN Here SRV 12. Name, address, date and place of birth of wife/husband (Give maiden name of wife) [Ten ho, dia-chi, ngay sinh, noi sinh cua v hay chong (Neu là V8 thi xin ghi nhú danh)] PHAM VAN HE deceased 1946 Date and place of marriage (Ngay va noi lap hon-thu) 13. Names, addresses, dates and places of birth of all children (Ten ho, a-chi, ngay sinh, noi sinh cua tât ca'các con cai) 1. PHAM NGUYEN HONG liv. w/me, 1929 VN KIEN AN 2. I THI HUE Y JOHNSON HUE THI USA/ 1966 1943 KIEA AN 3. THANH THI DANIEL USA / 1973 1939 / VN KIEA AN 14. Person(s) named in 12 and 13 who will accompany or follow me to the United States 15. Final address in the United States Dia chi cuoi cung [(Nhung) ngdi`c6 Khai ten 3'muc 12 va 13 ma secung di hay se di sau duong don toi Hoa-Ky 10516 PALOMINO EL PASO toi Hoa-Ky. TX 79924 16. Person you intend to join (Give name, address, and relationship, if any) 17. Name and address of sponsoring person or organization Duong don có y-dinh (8i 8' voi ai (Xin cho ten, dia-chi, va lien-he neu co). (If different from 16) Ten va dia-ch cua nguoi hay co-quan bao-tro (neu' Khac voi ten ghi muc 16) JOHNSON HUE THI x PHAM THI HUE / 10516 PALOMINO (Daughter) / EL PASO TX 79924 THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA (MAU DON NAY CO THE LANH MIEN-PH TAI CAC LANH-SU QUAN HOA-KY) NSN. 7540-00-149-0919 Mâu in ra truoc day khong con xu dung duoc nua) Previous edition not usable
